description.en:
Clap Clap Token (CCT) is a simple and transparent tipping token dedicated to street art and urban culture.

Art metropolis like Melbourne or Berlin attract hordes of tourists every year and offer a visual feast for the public. The city becomes the canvas of talented artists coming from all over the world.

CCT intends to valorize these open-air galleries and gives the opportunity to reward street artists for their exceptional work. Visitors can leave a tip as a virtual form of appreciation for the urban discoveries on offer.
